abstract: Driven column review of 2016 BMW 750i xDrive.

headline.main: Video Review: The BMW 750i xDrive, Tranquillity With a Touch of Vegas

snippet: A powerful V8 and adaptive suspension give this luxury ride serenity, but the mesmerizing cabin lighting seems to take a cue from the Las Vegas Strip.
lead_paragraph: A powerful V8 and adaptive suspension give this luxury ride serenity, but the mesmerizing cabin lighting seems to take a cue from the Las Vegas Strip.
